H0.text: In which country were 29 miners killed after 2 explosions in the Pike River Mine in November 2010, making it the most-deadly mining disaster there in 96 years. Australia

H1.text: In which country were 29 miners killed after 2 explosions in the Pike River Mine in November 2010, making it the most-deadly mining disaster there in 96 years. South Africa

H2.text: In which country were 29 miners killed after 2 explosions in the Pike River Mine in November 2010, making it the most-deadly mining disaster there in 96 years. United States

H3.text: In which country were 29 miners killed after 2 explosions in the Pike River Mine in November 2010, making it the most-deadly mining disaster there in 96 years. Nz

A4.text: The Pike River Mine disaster was a coal mining accident that began on 19 November 2010 in the West Coast region of New Zealand's South Island
